title: Pillars of Eternity - FitGirl
description:
Pillars of Eternity (v2.00.0706 + The White March Part I, MULTI7) [FitGirl Repack]


::Information::


Release Date: March 26, 2015 ~ August 25, 2015
Genres/Tags: RPG, Party-based, Isometric, 3D models on 2D backgrounds
Developer: Obsidian Entertainment
Publisher: Obsidian Entertainment
Platform: PC [Repack]
Engine: Unity
Steam User Rating: 90% of user reviews are positive (based on 4886 reviews)

Interface Language: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish, Russian, Polish
Audio Language: English
Crack: not required, DRM-free by GOG


::Repack Features::


Based on Pillars.of.Eternity.The.White.March.Part.I-CODEX ISO release: codex-pillars.of.eternity.the.white.march.part.i.iso (11,062,968,320 bytes)
100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
NOTHING ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
Includes original PoE, updated to v2.00.0706 PX1
The White March Part I expansion included
Pre-order & Kickstarter Backers DLCs included: Pledge of Gaun Ring, Cloak of the Obsidian Order, Tiny Obsidian Wyrm & Space Piglet
Made compatible with future GOG patches (registry patched)
Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from 10.3 to 6.3 GB)
Installation takes 10-15 minutes (depending on your system)
HDD space after installation: 18 GB
Language can be changed in game settings
Repack by FitGirl
